sentences.sentence: Our findings corroborate the view that the lodicules of grasses are homologous to eudicot petals.
sentences.translation: 本研究还证明了禾本科植物的浆片和双子叶植物中花瓣是同源器官的观点。

sentences.sentence: Your friend will corroborate this - ask them.
sentences.translation: 问问你的朋友，他会向你证实这一点的。

sentences.sentence: The polls corroborate the baleful economic portents.
sentences.translation: 民意调查加重了这种经济的不祥之兆。
